home.heroTitle: What do you need to fix?

benefits.title: Why commo.cc
benefits.client1: Verified professionals — only ID-verified masters in search.
benefits.client2: Easy search — by category, region, and real ratings.
benefits.client3: Flexibility — post your task or browse and contact pros directly.
benefits.client4: Fair ratings — only you rate; pros cannot change or delete.
benefits.pro1: Trust — ID verification shows clients you're real.
benefits.pro2: No commission — subscription by category and region.
benefits.pro3: Loyalty discount — high rating reduces subscription cost.
benefits.pro4: Fair game — only clients rate; ratings are immutable.

settings.title: Settings
settings.countryHelp: You will see only services and data for this country.
settings.communicationLanguagesHelp: Languages you speak. Shown to clients and pros when viewing your profile.

forPros.title: For Pros
forPros.idVerification: ID verification — build trust with clients.
forPros.noCommission: No commission on deals — tiered subscription by category and region.
forPros.loyaltyDiscount: Loyalty discount — 4.9+ rating reduces subscription cost.
forPros.immutableRatings: Only clients can rate; you cannot edit or delete. Fair game.
forPros.signInToStart: Sign in with Google to get started.

howItWorks.title: How it Works
howItWorks.step1Desc: Use the search or browse categories.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Only ID-verified professionals with real client ratings.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Communicate in Google Chat; you leave the rating — pros cannot change it.

signin.title: Sign in
signin.notConfigured: Google OAuth is not configured yet.
signin.configureHint: Add GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID to .env.local and set the redirect URI in Google Console to .../api/auth/callback/google

search.exampleLanguagesShown: Example: when viewing a pro (or client), their communication languages are shown:

myProjects.intro: Your projects as a client. Publish without verification.
myProjects.comingSoon: Project list and creation — coming soon.

pro.verificationRequired: To work as a master you must pass ID verification. Client and pro ratings are separate.
pro.pendingVerification: Your master profile is pending verification.

landing.title: Global Services Marketplace
landing.subtitle: Service marketplace connecting clients with verified professionals. Choose your country.
landing.block1Desc: Mandatory ID verification and immutable client ratings. Only verified professionals; only clients can rate.
landing.block2Desc: Tiered subscription for pros by category and region. Loyalty discount for 4.9+ rating.
landing.block3Desc: Sign in with Google. Message and agree with pros in Google Chat — no extra app to install.
